name: Hilton On The Park Melbourne

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for 3 nights on the last stop of our Australian Honeymoon.
reviews.title: Good Club Lounge
Needs new plumbing, New TV's, New......
reviews.text: We had booked an executive floor room, which included access to the club lounge for a price of AUD 230 or GBP 100 per night.
I used to be a Hilton Gold Card holder, but now only a Silver member which means no upgrades!
reviews.title: Relaxing garden oasis on the edge of the city

likes.disliked: — time it took to check out!

reviews.title: Excellent staff, Good location but the building need proper renovation
reviews.text: The executive room was pretty good, but as mentioned in another review, it only had a small 15 inch flatscreen TV with a strange remote.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On the first morning, we were rudely awoken by the sound of hammering at 7.30AM. I called reception to enquire what was going on. They informed me that they were renovating a whole floor, some 6 levels below us! They then offered to move rooms for us, which I said an immediate 'yes please' to. A ground floor poolside room or a corner suite on the 7th floor was offered to us. Of course we took the suite and a porter helped us move. This whole episode was handled with great courtesy and professionalism by the Hilton staff.
reviews.title: A Melbourne Beauty!

likes.liked: — Great location, stylish, luxurious, many little extras and FREE due to hotel points scheme!
likes.disliked: — jacuzzi was a bit 'tired'...but it wasn't really a problem!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Only a short walk from downtown Melbourne, the Hilton on the Park is a very comfortable hotel. Our room had been recently redone with modern touches. The staff was extremely helpful in providing restaurants and ideas of things to do during our stay.
reviews.title: Comfortable Modern Room

reviews.text: I stayed there for two nights on business and really loved the place. Check-in with a very welcoming member of staff took little over a minute.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel, very friendly staff!

likes.liked: — Friendly service, clean and quiet rooms

aka: Hilton On The Park Melbourne Hotel Melbourne
description: Located in the attractive inner-city suburb of East Melbourne, Hilton on the Park is an elegantly furbished hotel directly opposite the Melbourne Cricket Ground (MCG).Each furbished hotel room has warm, natural tones and feature large windows, a flat-screen TV and a wide range of amenities to ensure a relaxing and easy stay. Offering free Wi-Fi to all guests, the iconic Park Lounge bar is the perfect place to have a casual drink before heading to the MCG. For breakfast and dinner, the Gallery Restaurant also provides market fresh cuisines while overlooking the beautiful Fitzroy Gardens.
